Entries.default:
The group's leader takes a silent step forward and unsheathes his blade.

"Keep thyself strong against those that would batter thee," he whispers.

"Close yours ears, brothers and sisters. This one may already be corrupted!"

There seems to be no reasoning with them.
"Keep thy soul fortified against the trials that shall overtake thee," the leader continues.

A murmur of assent passes through the group, and one by one their faces light with grins as bright as forge flame.

They lunge toward you as one.

You turn on your heel and sprint down the lane. Your foot catches on an exposed stone, and you crash hard to the ground.

You stumble to your feet and keep running.
The armored figures mutter benedictions as they steel themselves to face you. Soot darkens their heavy cloaks.
The sooty figures from before once again bar your path.
